content.en: Grid synchronization algorithms: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to improve the synchronization of grid-connected converters and power systems under different operating conditions. These algorithms, such as the adaptive linear optimal filtering (ALOF) technique, fixed-reference-frame phase-locked loop (FRF-PLL), and adaptive frequency locked loop (FLL) synchronization scheme, play a crucial role in achieving stable and efficient grid synchronization. By utilizing these algorithms, researchers aim to enhance the performance and robustness of power systems, ensuring reliable and high-quality power supply even in the presence of grid disturbances.
content.da: Gitter-synkroniseringsalgoritmer: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre synkroniseringen af gittertilsluttede omformere og elsystemer under forskellige driftsforhold. Disse algoritmer, såsom den adaptive lineære optimal filtreringsteknik (ALOF), faste-referenceramme fase-låst kredsløbs (FRF-PLL) og adaptiv frekvenslåst kredsløbs (FLL) synkroniseringsskema, spiller en afgørende rolle i at opnå stabil og effektiv gitter-synkronisering. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter forskere mod at forbedre ydeevnen og robustheden af elsystemer, hvilket sikrer en pålidelig og høj kvalitet af strømforsyningen, selv i tilfælde af netforstyrrelser.
